channel.title: Trajectory Planning on ADR Team
channel.description: Recent content in Trajectory Planning on ADR Team

item.title: ADR Wins Best Paper Award on UAVs at ICRA
item.description: We are thrilled to announce that our paper, “Time-Optimal Gate-Traversing Planner for Autonomous Drone Racing,” has won the IEEE ICRA Best Paper Award in Unmanned Aerial Systems at the International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA) 2024, held in Yokohama, Japan. This prestigious recognition comes from a pool of over 4,000 submissions from researchers around the world, highlighting the significance and innovation of our research. The paper was authored by Chao Qin, a PhD student in the Flight Systems and Control (FSC) lab and the chief engineer of UTAT ADR, who proposed the core algorithm.
